      • Book

        public Book(java.lang.String id,
            java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String author,
            java.lang.String isbn,
            java.lang.String owner,
            java.lang.String status,
            boolean nonExchange,
            java.lang.String comment,
            java.lang.String condition,
            java.lang.String photo,
            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> requesters)
        Book constructor
        Parameters:
        id - unique book id
        title - title of book
        author - author of book
        isbn - isbn of Book
        owner - User that owns the Book
        status - indicates availability of book
        comment - comment set by owner
        condition - condition of the book, set by owner
        photo - photo string of book by owner
        requesters - ArrayList of user emails that have requested the book
